description: Stylesheet for managing themes and layouts in the Tic Tac Toe web application, featuring light and dark themes, responsive design, and visual effects.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main layout class for the application, defining background color and text alignment.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Class for the logo with specified height and animation properties.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header class for the application with layout and styling for the main header area.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Class for links in the application, with defined color and transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Class for the button that toggles between light and dark themes, including styling and hover effects.
